title: Mobile Microlearning-Based Human Anatomy Education Improvement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: A short-term course for in-service practitioners emphasizing interactive content via mobile devices and peer collaborative learning environments

learning_goals: Over 90% of learners can accurately describe structural features of major body systems using 3D virtual anatomy models.
Learners perform real-time discussions with peers at least three times weekly via a mobile platform and submit learning reports reflecting feedback.
Learners can analyze anatomical applications linked to clinical environments with 80% accuracy through AR-based practical exercises.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
